author: Special Correspondent
title: Alliance Francaise de Pondichery to hold classes online
description: Now, learn a language while in lockdown mode.Alliance Francaise de Pondichery, Asia's oldest and one of the earliest chapters in the world, has rolled out online French classes for stay-at-home le
content:
Now, learn a language while in lockdown mode.
Alliance Francaise de Pondichery, Asia's oldest and one of the earliest chapters in the world, has rolled out online French classes for stay-at-home learners following the COVID-19 lockdown.
